about_the_game:
About

Leona's Lewd Talk Voice Drama is a collection of voice tracks from Super Naughty Maid 2. Listen to Leona's innermost thoughts as she does everything to service and test her beloved master's sexual prowess!

Also includes an English translated script as well.

Tracklist

1. Boobjob (10:28)
2. Blowjob (07:02)
3. Blowjob Part A (09:14)
4. Blowjob Part B (03:53)
5. Missionary (06:18)
6. Missionary Part A (05:22)
7. Missionary Part B (09:15)
8. Cowgirl (07:33)
9. Cowgirl Part A (07:09)
10. Cowgirl Part B (06:45)
11. Cowgirl Part C (04:04)
12. Doggystyle (06:05)
13. Doggystyle Part A (05:16)
14. Doggystyle Part B (05:38)

content_descriptors.notes: The voice drama contains voiced sexual innuendo and content that's not suitable for users under the age of 18.
